reviews.title: Horrible Experience
reviews.text: I bought two tickets to this experience and when I showed up there was no one there and all of the doors were chain locked. I have been trying to get ahold of them for a week to either reschedule for when they are open or get a refund.  I have left both voicemails and emails and no one has responded to me. 0/10 recommend

reviews.title: A magical Peruvian experience!
reviews.text: I learned a lot about Peruvian gastronomy and culture, and I really enjoyed  Peruvian experience, it was my first time eating Peruvian food so I loved it!Staff was extremely kind and made me feel as if I were at home, especially Andres, who had his eyes on us all the time during the whole experience, he was also very patient when answering all our questions. He made me feel at ease!100% recommended!

reviews.title: Family vacation
reviews.text: If you visit Peru and want to find out more about their culture this is one of the places to go and do it.  Tells you a lot about their history and culture

reviews.title: Excelente for Solo Travelers
reviews.text: The Peruvian experience was amazing and worth the money. The guides are able to present in bother English and Spanish. If you are traveling alone, having a group experience is nice. I never felt like I wasn't a part of the group, during the tour, and it was super fun to get to know new people. Pro tip: the chocolate museum (el museo de chocÃ³) near parque Kennedy has 25% off coupons for the experience. Also, if you're a foreigner, do not forget your passport or a picture of your passport to participate in the experience. Enjoy!

reviews.title: Magnifique !
reviews.text: Very well done and super fun :)As a Peruvian I totally enjoyed discovering the influences of foreign cultures into our cuisine,

reviews.title: Excellent Experience!
reviews.text: Me and my family got together in Lima and went together to the Peruvian Experience since it was very well recommended to us. We really had a great time and is surpassed every expectation. Top quality!

reviews.title: Awesome Experience!
reviews.text: Came to Peruvian Experience with business colleagues.  Had an outstanding time learning about gastronomy, history, and culture of Peru.  A must visit!

reviews.title: Incredible Highlight Tour of Peruvian Cuisine and Culture!
reviews.text: I recently visited the Peruvian Experience with my wife and a few friends.  We did the full guided tour, which covers some cultural background information similar to a museum, a series of short movies, a Pisco Sour cocktail workshop, a "make your own ceviche" cooking workshop and then a tasting of the most representative dishes of Peru.We really had a great time and the two hours went by very fast.  The staff was incredibly friendly and joyful.  The food was amazing, and I certainly recommend not eating prior to this tour, as you will be getting a very full meal.I recommend this tour to anybody visiting Lima.  The price is excellent in comparison to what you receive and you will have a great time.

reviews.title: Worth every penny!
reviews.text: We had a great time. The hospitality was second to none. The whole staff was very enthusiastic and really enjoyed their jobs. The food was excellent. Overall it was a tremendous experience.
